channel.title: CVE Feed for thecatkin -- ReDi Restaurant Reservation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for thecatkin -- ReDi Restaurant Reservation

item.title: CVE-2024-9240|2024-10-17T16:15:31.112Z -- thecatkin -- redi%20restaurant%20reservation
item.description: The ReDi Restaurant Reservation plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 24.0902. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-9240|2024-10-17T02:06:03.971Z -- thecatkin -- redi%20restaurant%20reservation
item.description: The ReDi Restaurant Reservation plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 24.0902. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
